text: Arthur Alan Neu (February 9, 1933 â€“ January 2, 2015) was an American Republican politician and lawyer. He served as the 40th Lieutenant Governor of Iowa from 1973 to 1979. Neu died at a hospital in Des Moines, Iowa at the age of 81 on January 2, 2015.Former Lieutenant Governor Art Neu diesFormer Iowa Lieutenant Governor Art Neu has died at 82 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Lieutenant Governors of Iowa Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Iowa
